00027         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00028         {
00029             if (Session["PWAS_order_id"] != null)
00030             {
00031                 int orderID = System.Int32.Parse(Session["PWAS_order_id"].ToString());
00032 
00033                 IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00034                 Order current_order = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00035                                 
00036                 this.txtJobName.Text = current_order.job_name;
00037                 this.txtFinalSizeX.Text = current_order.width.ToString();
00038                 this.txtFinalSizeY.Text = current_order.height.ToString();
00039                 this.txtQty.Text = current_order.quantity.ToString();
00040                 this.lstFinish.SelectedIndex = this.lstFinish.Items.IndexOf(lstFinish.Items.FindByText(current_order.stock_finish));
00041                 this.lstWeight.SelectedIndex = this.lstWeight.Items.IndexOf(lstWeight.Items.FindByText(current_order.stock_weight));
00042                 this.chkTwoSide.Checked = current_order.two_sided;
00043                 this.chkfolded.Checked = current_order.folded;
00044                 this.chkShip.Checked = current_order.ship;
00045                 
00046 
00047                 //disable
00048                 this.txtJobName.Enabled = false;
00049                 this.txtFinalSizeX.Enabled = false;
00050                 this.txtFinalSizeY.Enabled = false;
00051                 this.txtQty.Enabled = false;
00052                 this.lstFinish.Enabled = false;
00053                 this.lstWeight.Enabled = false;
00054                 this.chkTwoSide.Enabled = false;
00055                 this.chkfolded.Enabled = false;
00056                 this.chkShip.Enabled = false;
00057             }
00058             else
00059             {
00060                 Response.Redirect("customer_view_order.aspx");
00061             }
00062 
00063         }
00064     }
